modName: Fort greymoor no soldiers or bandits
descriptionHtml:
Some wish to mod this fort, but didn't know how to remove bandits and the soldiers. Now the bandits spawn, but don't reset and the troops won't take over the fort.

However, In the ck one will find stuff toggled off until the soldiers take over the fort, beds and chests with some items. They will never be used now. I would have cleared them, but some house modders want to enable a new door to a new edited cell to not break anything so I just left them.

If you wish, you can already use it as player home. The containers already don't respawn expect for the boss chest. This is a highly requested fort after all. But no crafting or anything extra is added to it, as it meant as modder resource and wanted it as unedited as possible.Â
author: Boombro
